name: Mike Greenly
what_you_do: Mike Greenly provides speech coaching services to help individuals improve their presentation skills and confidence in public speaking.
who_you_serve: He serves executives and professionals globally, particularly those who struggle with public speaking and presentation delivery.
business_focus: Mike Greenly provides speech coaching services to help individuals improve their presentation skills and confidence in public speaking.

jv_history.partner_name: Michael Greenberg founder of Gentleman Of Technology & Call for Content
jv_history.source_quote: umnify as COO (now defunct, raised ~$1.3MM).\r\nTo make going out ... he launched his first independent venture, Call For Content, in January of 2017. Call For Content is a full-service podcasting age
